page.title: 08An elderly life on West Road
page.content: I wake up at about half past nine in the morning.Ma makes some porridge while she has bread with bran on top. We then feed Kermit,our cat.Itake out a couple of chairs into our garden if it is fine. After elevenses(a cup of tea and a biscuit) I usually go and do a bit of shopping while Ma does a crossword. It is annoying, having to get the car out just to visit the shops but I like shopping because I can buy myself a supply of sweets to last a little while. It annoyed me to see a lot of lovely countryside changed into Open Cast but the worst thing about it is they spoilt a lot of lovely walks for the people in our area.
